title: 服务端后台报错，麻烦看看
author: A_Word
txt_content:
加了称号插件DeluxeTags才会出现，且玩家每发一句话就报错一次，聊天插件为TrChat
[17:23:31] [Async Chat Thread - #0/ERROR]: Could not pass event AsyncPlayerChatEvent to DeluxeTags v1.8.1 java.util.IllegalFormatFlagsException: Flags = ' <'         at org.bukkit.event.player.AsyncPlayerChatEvent.setFormat(AsyncPlayerChatEvent.java:101) ~[patched_1.15.2.jar:git-Paper-176]         at me.clip.deluxetags.listeners.ChatFormatListener.onChat(ChatFormatListener.java:20) ~[?:?]         at com.destroystokyo.paper.event.executor.asm.generated.GeneratedEventExecutor100.execute(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]         at org.bukkit.plugin.EventExecutor.lambda$create$1(EventExecutor.java:69) ~[patched_1.15.2.jar:git-Paper-176]         at co.aikar.timings.TimedEventExecutor.execute(TimedEventExecutor.java:76) ~[patched_1.15.2.jar:git-Paper-176]         at org.bukkit.plugin.RegisteredListener.callEvent(RegisteredListener.java:70) ~[patched_1.15.2.jar:git-Paper-176]         at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.callEvent(SimplePluginManager.java:607) ~[patched_1.15.2.jar:git-Paper-176]         at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.PlayerConnection.chat(PlayerConnection.java:1738) ~[patched_1.15.2.jar:git-Paper-176]         at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.PlayerConnection.a(PlayerConnection.java:1653) ~[patched_1.15.2.jar:git-Paper-176]         at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.PacketPlayInChat$1.run(PacketPlayInChat.java:41) ~[patched_1.15.2.jar:git-Paper-176]         at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_241]         at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_241]         at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_241]         at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_241]         at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_241] [17:23:31] [Async Chat Thread - #0/INFO]: [WordsCraft] [这是称号]A_Words: 1

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
配置中
format_chat.enabled
改成false应该就可以了

replies.author: FM雨爵
replies.txt_content:
FM雨爵 发表于 2020-4-13 17:33
诶，数据缺失？
哦哦哦，看错了我再看看

换个插件吧[聊天][UD]FreeSwitchTitle —— 可自由切换称号的称号系统[全版本]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-615611-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)这个
这个不错还能加buff和粒子效果---望采纳

replies.author: 名副其实
replies.txt_content: 可能是dtags变量相关出现了问题，请仔细检查变量

replies.author: A_Word
replies.txt_content:
GiNYAi 发表于 2020-4-13 17:52
配置中
format_chat.enabled
改成false应该就可以了
成功解决
